content:
alexcrichton commented on issue #5766:

I'll note that if this still seems like something we want to go with despite the possible downsides I'll do a pass over the docs/contributing-ci.md file and write down our new CI steps and such.

Additionally merging this PR will logistically require a few changes:

  • I'll need to update the branch protections for main
  • All PRs to be merged after this one will need to be rebased on top of this one
  • I'd enable release-branch protections after the 6.0.0 release is made on the 20th since it won't have these changes.

alexcrichton commented on issue #5766:

I was hoping to showcase "look this PR ran so little CI" but I forgot that my commit had the string prtest:full in it so it ended up running full CI. So I suppose this is an example of a full CI run instead of a minimal one, but you can also see how this is switching up the jobs so the branch protections need modifications
